#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define LL long long int
#define sc(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define sl(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define pf(x) printf("%d\t",x)
#define pl(x) printf("%lld\n",x)
#define pb push_back
#define F first
#define S second
#define maxn 1005
#define M 1000000007
using namespace std;
LL a[1000005];

int main ()
{
	int n;
	LL x,ans=0;
	sc(n);
	ans=(LL)n*((LL)n-1)/2;
	memset(a,0,sizeof(a));
	for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		sc(x);
		a[x]++;
	}
	for(int i=1;i<=1000000;i++)
	{
		if(a[i]>1)
		{
			ans-=a[i]*(a[i]-1)/2;
		}
	}
	pl(ans);
	return 0;
}
